channel.title: Hacked again =[
channel.description: Well recently its been about 9 days, so im fucked but my 132 got stolen and i tried to recover but denied again and again so anyone know any good ways?

item.title: Hacked again =[
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

sanga282:

or hered a few options and they are golden: don’t tell people your password!, use; lowercase letters, Uppercase letters, symbols and numbers. If you keep a save file encrypt it. And if you generally got hacked then you are unlucky

You could of easily just said ‘Don’t be an idiot’.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked again =[
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

sanga282:

or hered a few options and they are golden: don’t tell people your password!, use; lowercase letters, Uppercase letters, symbols and numbers. If you keep a save file encrypt it. And if you generally got hacked then you are unlucky

RS passwords aren’t case sensitive.

item.title: Hacked again =[
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“coaco260, post:18, topic:225036”][quote author=Coder xynt link=topic=295803.msg2382838#msg2382838 date=1218642746]
^I downloaded a clean keylogger called “ActMon”, and each time my friends came, i turned it on, and i got there passwords. but then i obviously never hacked them.
[/quote]

hmm keyloggers are very like dangorerous in a way bce they could have like trojan in them that your comp cant detect ive had a keylogger that when i downloaded i virus scanned multiple times bce i wasent to sure about it and after a period of time (1-3 days) my comp crashed so i was like wtf then i found out it was the keylogger so those things are just messed and why would you hack your friends like their your Friends or they not maybe unless if they hacked you first they ya of course :p[/quote]

Please, just stop now. Then go read these tutorials:
http://www.monash.edu.au/lls/llonline/grammar/index.xml
http://www.squidoo.com/spellingamnesia
http://www.about-goal-setting.com/punctuation-guide.html

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked again =[
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Tico135:

If your parents ever gave you their credit card to make the account a member, post the credit card holder’s name, and other information about the card to prove the account is yours. I’ve done this before and it worked.

As well as send a copy of the info to my PM box, for furthur investigation.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked again =[
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:4, topic:225036”]It’s actually your fault. No matter what you think. In some way, you did something that made your account vulnerable.

You gave out your password,
You set an easy password,
You bought an account,
You did something else stupid.[/quote]

You beat me to it. Now what shall i do for fun?

Read full topic
